problem.p: A rod of mass \(M\) and length \(d\) is initially at rest on a horizontal and frictionless table contained in the xy plane. The rod is free to rotate about an axis perpendicular to the plane and passing through the pivot point at a distance \(d/3\) measured from one of its ends as shown. A small disc of mass m, moving with speed \(v_o\), hits the rod and stick to it at the point of impact at a distance \(d/3\) from the pivot. (Gravity is pointing into the screen).
If the mass of the rod is \(M = 4m\), what is the magnitude of the angular velocity of the rod+disc system after the collision?
